sentences: Partnerid on meie kõige olulisemad liitlased ärimaailmas.
Meie partnerid aitavad meil laieneda uutele turgudele.
context: "Partnerid" is the plural form of "partner" in Estonian. It refers to business partners, collaborators, or associates who work together towards common goals. In a professional context, it's commonly used when discussing business relationships, collaborations, and teamwork between different companies or individuals.
